Hello fellow members,
                                    At the moment I am researching the Battle of Nagashino and plan to recreate this Battle on the wargames table in 15mm.I own the Osprey campaign book "Nagashino 1575 Slaughter at the Barricades" by Stephen Turnbull and this is full of useful information, but it is a bit short coming when it comes to Mon identification and colours.
At present I am building the allied armies of Oda Nobunaga and Tokugawa Ieyasu,and need information on Mon identification and colours of the generals and their troops present as follows.......................................
1.MIZUNO NOBUMOTO
2.SAKUMA NOBUMORI
3.NIWA NAGAHIDE...GOT...RED X CROSS ON WHITE
4.ODA NOBUNAGA..GOT..YELLOW FLOWER ON WHITE
5.SHIBATA KATSUIE
6.HASHIBA HIDEYOSHI
7.TAKIGAWA KAZUMASU
8.TORI MOTOTADA
9.TOKUGAWA NOBUYASU
10.ISHIKAWA KAZUMASA
11.TOKUGAWA IEYASU
12.HONDA TAKAKATSU
13.SAKAKIBARA YASUMASA
14.OSUKA YASUTAKA
15.SAKAI TADATSUGU...NOT IMPORTANT...RAIDING..
16.OKUBO TADAYO
17.NAGAOKA FUJITAKA
18.AKECHI MITSUHIDE
19.ANDO NORITOSHI
20.MORI YOSHINARI
Any help or pointed in the right direction for futher reseach would be of great help to me and would the Mon and colours be the same for their troops.

                                                                                                                                               YOURS GRATEFULLY,
                                                                                                                                                         MR.R.A.KING (RAY)
